Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-22801 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.54-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-22801 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.54-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libpng is earlier than 1.6.54-1, affected by CVE-2026-22801
